channel.title: Install Guide Update: Whonix 9.6 Maintenance Release
channel.description:
The Qubes + Whonix install guides have been updated to reflect the recent Whonix 9.6 Maintenance Release.
Qubes + Whonix: Wiki Documentation:
[b]https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Qubes[/b]
Whonix 9.6 Maintenance Release Announcement:
[b]https://www.whonix.org/blog/whonix-9-6-maintenance-release[/b]
FYI:
The original HVM configuration of Qubes + Whonix is currently in the process of being deprecated, in favor of the new native ProxyVM + AppVM architecture. The new Qubes + Whonix platform is available now, but has not been fully leak tested yet. The old HVM wiki instructions will remain for the time being. A beta install guide for the new platform is linked to on the Qubes + Whonix wiki page for those who would like to use it now.
